text: Swaggy ( who plays for the Warriors ) is in town to play the Lakers - - and stopped by his old stomping grounds for dinner. Just so happens, Iggy had arrived a few hours before and was still inside. The two were only inside the restaurant together for a short while - - but afterward, Young broke it down for us... and told us things are cordial. In fact, he even gave us ADVICE on how to act when you run into your ex... and it ain't half bad! But, Iggy clearly didn't feel the same way - - because when a reporter claimed the two were on a ` ` dinner date,'' Iggy unloaded on Twitter. ` ` Ryan Smith @ TheDailyMail i hope all
